scripts.monitor-ci: echo '🚀 Monitoring CI...' && sleep 90 && git status && echo '✅ Check complete'
scripts.ci-status: echo '🔍 CI Status:' && git log --oneline -3 && echo '📊 Local build test:' && npm run -w perday-music build --silent 2>&1 | tail -5
scripts.ci:local: npm ci && npm run -w perday-music lint && npm run -w perday-music build
scripts.auto-ci: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); console.log('🚀 Starting FULLY autonomous CI monitoring...'); setTimeout(() => { try { console.log('⏱️ Checking build status...'); execSync('git status', { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('📊 Testing local build...'); execSync('npm run -w perday-music build', { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('✅ Local build successful!'); console.log('🚀 Pushing to GitHub...'); execSync('git push origin main', { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('⏱️ Waiting for GitHub CI...'); setTimeout(() => { console.log('🔍 Checking GitHub CI status...'); execSync('git status', { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('✅ Full cycle complete! Check GitHub Actions for results.'); }, 120000); } catch (e) { console.log('❌ Issue detected, checking logs...'); try { execSync('npm run -w perday-music build 2>&1 | head -10', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch (e2) { console.log('🔧 Build error logged above'); } } }, 90000);"
